charges.charge_disposition: Dft is hereby comm to the cust of the bop to be impris for a term of 96 mos. upon rel frm impr, the dft shall be placed on supv rel for a term of 3 yrs under the following terms and conds: The dft shall comply w/the rules and regulations of the U.S. P/O and gen ord 318; The dft shall participate, as instructed by the po, in a prog apprvd by the U.S. p/o, for treatment of narcotic addiciton or drug dependency, which may include counseling and testing, to determine if the dft has reverted to the use of drugs; the dft shall pay the rest imposed by this judgment and that remains unpaid at the commencement of the term of community supv, as directed by the po: It is ord that the dft shall make rest to the following aggrieved pty in the following amt: Downey Savings and Loan 13928 Pioneer Blvd. Norwalk, Ca. 90650 Attn: Branch manager. The crt recommends to the bop, that the dft be design to Fed Correcitonal Inst at Sheridan, Oregon and be placed in a prog for treatment of narcotic addiction or drug dependency which may include counseling and testing. If no space it is available at Fed Correction Inst at Sheridan the crt recommends that the dft be design to an inst where such a prog exists and space in the prog is available. (1)
